detaileddescription.para: This method is non const only due to this->_field that can be modified (to point to the same domaine than returned object). So warning, to access to this->_field only when the returned object is alive.

memberdef.argsstring: (const Domaine_dis_base &dom_dis, ICoCo::TrioField &afield, int type, int loc_faces)
memberdef.name: build_triomesh
